text: Tasted on 05.04.17. Small head disappearing to thin layer. Murky colour of red grapefruit. Great and intensive fruity aroma with a lot of spices. Great fruity taste with medium fruity acidity and quite intensive spiciness.Very refreshing.
Beer Geek Madness. Świetny aromat, rześki, owocowy, do tego pierniki. W smaku podobnie, przyjemna kwaśność, delikatnie słone. Rewelacyjny balans, rewelacyjne piwo.
Tap @ Beer Geek Madness 5. (Backlog). Amber, hazy, medium head. Plum, apricot, spices, pepper, honey, mirabelle. Medium sourness, slightly salty. Medium body, average carbonation. Very nice.

Strong aroma of spices, a bit of kefir, black pepper and a bit of fruits (prune?). Taste is acidic with little to no sweetness or bitterness. Spices play major part which on one hand is interesting but gets annoying after a while. Good beer overall, but not as session as gose should be in my opinion.

Kolejny bardzo dobry sour ale od Deer Bear. Bardzo intensywnie owocowy, śliwkowo-malinowo-truskawkowy, z delikatną nutą piernika (?). Wytrawne, z solidnym, kremowym, mega przyjemnym ciałem. Wyraziście kwaśne, owocowo ściągające na finiszu. Świetne piwo, mam nadzieję że seria będzie kontynuowana :)

Tasting glass draft @ Drugie Dno. With plum. Very hazy to murky orange fruits appearance, off-white head. Nose is massive fruit, fruit compote feel, strawberry, plum, raspberry, felt like far more different fruits than just plum. Taste is basically more fruit compote than beer, thick stone fruit, plum, strawberry, faitnly sour, fruit tea, huge fruit tea,.. Soft carbonation, thick fruit tea & compote body. Reminds me more of fruit tea & compote than beer but tis very fruity, tasty, quite pleasant, a nice one.
BGM Backlog. Plum, spicy, cinnamon, coriander, lemon. Moderate sour, light sweet.

Draught
Aroma-peach, mango, pineapple
Appearance-orange, hazy, white foam
Taste-medium sourness, light sweetness, salty, 
Palate-medium body, sticky, average carbonation, long finish, 
Overall-very good
Backlog. V edycja Beer Geek Madness w Zaklętych Rewirach we Wrocławiu, 1.04.2017
BGM5 1.04.2017, Zaklęte Rewiry Wrocław, ocena przepisana z notatek , próbka 50ml.
